LABEL: 0x3B4
STRING: 「He... It's possible he's infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x3F4
STRING: Yukari made a painful declaration.

LABEL: 0x416
STRING: Her eyes were red, like she was about to cry.

LABEL: 0x444
STRING: Hiragino was infected?

LABEL: 0x462
STRING: And, not with <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x4A6
STRING: ――But <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x4C4
STRING: I remembered that name Yukari mentioned.

LABEL: 0x4F6
STRING: I heard it in the observation deck at the time of the accident.

LABEL: 0x588
STRING: It was what Misasagi had been looking for in the darkness while wading through the fleeing people.

LABEL: 0x5DC
STRING: 「I have to find <Alice> soon...」

LABEL: 0x60E
STRING: 「<Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: That――

LABEL: 0x73A
STRING: 「...That wasn't a person's name?」

LABEL: 0x768
STRING: Yukari shook her head as I spoke my thoughts out loud.

LABEL: 0x79A
STRING: 「Then is it the same kind of bacteria as <COOS>...?」

LABEL: 0x83C
STRING: 「No.」

LABEL: 0x859
STRING: She shook her head again.

LABEL: 0x877
STRING: She began to explain in a matter-of-fact voice.

LABEL: 0x8A4
STRING: 「<Alice> is not a bacteria―

LABEL: 0x929
STRING: it's a virus.」

LABEL: 0x945
STRING: 「It's very different from the bacterial threat of <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x988
STRING: 「Not a bacteria, but a virus?」

LABEL: 0x9C1
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x9D7
STRING: 「<COOS> was a living being in and of itself and had a collective will.」

LABEL: 0xA2D
STRING: 「<Alice> isn't like that. It's more mysterious...」

LABEL: 0xA7A
STRING: Yukari lowered her eyes, at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0xAA6
STRING: Hiragino, on the other hand, furrowed his brow in thought.

LABEL: 0xBA9
STRING: 「I'm sure you know about <Alice>, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0xBF8
STRING: 「Yes, I've heard of it, of course...」

LABEL: 0xC91
STRING: 「But, why does it come up now?」

LABEL: 0xCC3
STRING: 「Why would such a rare virus be a problem right now――」

LABEL: 0xD02
STRING: Hiragino looked up as if he'd realized something.

LABEL: 0xDA8
STRING: 「Momoi.」

LABEL: 0xDBE
STRING: 「That girl we were trying to retrieve... Was she the carrier for <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0xEAA
STRING: 「I don't know her name, but――」

LABEL: 0xEDC
STRING: 「She was the girl ROMLES was protecting as an <Alice> carrier.」

LABEL: 0xF8F
STRING: 「And, that finger inside the fish most likely belonged to her.」

LABEL: 0xFE1
STRING: 「Of course, it's natural to assume that the fish was also contaminated by <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: 「What...」

LABEL: 0x1073
STRING: 「So, unfortunately, it's possible that you may have already been infected as well.」

LABEL: 0x10EB
STRING: Hiragino looked dismayed.

LABEL: 0x110D
STRING: He seemed to be convinced of something, but I had no idea what their back-and-forth meant.

LABEL: 0x1161
STRING: 「I'm sorry... Could you elaborate a little?」

LABEL: 0x119D
STRING: 「What exactly is <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0x11D3
STRING: 「From what you're telling me, it's not just a virus, is it?」

LABEL: 0x1215
STRING: 「And, is this person you're talking about Hikari?」

LABEL: 0x1259
STRING: 「You're saying she was a... carrier?」

LABEL: 0x128B
STRING: <Alice> and Hikari.

LABEL: 0x1341
STRING: The face of the girl who had referred to herself as a poet flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x13DE
STRING: The girl who had called Touri her sister and had died without ever meeting her.

LABEL: 0x148E
STRING: Why did her name come up now of all times...?

LABEL: 0x14BE
STRING: So, that finger was――

LABEL: 0x14F7
STRING: 「Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x1665
STRING: 「According to your story, there's a chance we may have come into contact with <Alice>, right?」

LABEL: 0x16B7
STRING: 「If that's true, then he has the right to know.」

LABEL: 0x1700
STRING: 「You knew about <Alice>, Hiragino-san...?」

LABEL: 0x174D
STRING: 「I used to be involved, just a little bit.」

LABEL: 0x17EA
STRING: 「...Not that I got any credit for it.」

LABEL: 0x1825
STRING: He smiled lightly as he said it.

LABEL: 0x1851
STRING: I could see a hint of self-derision in his lonely smile.

LABEL: 0x1885
STRING: It was a deep and painful smile, as if he still had a lingering attachment to something that he had to let go of.

LABEL: 0x18ED
STRING: Like he was remembering something from the distant past.

LABEL: 0x1A00
STRING: 「...I don't mind letting him know.」

LABEL: 0x1A32
STRING: 「<Alice> is not something nearly as top-secret as <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x1AF7
STRING: 「However, Hiragino-sensei...」

LABEL: 0x1B19
STRING: 「Shouldn't the first step be to find a cure?」

LABEL: 0x1BC9
STRING: 「A cure...?」

LABEL: 0x1BF6
STRING: 「Yes. The cure for <Alice> should've been stored in this ship's laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x1C48
STRING: 「So, let's hurry up and search for it―

LABEL: 0x1CC3
STRING: before it's too late.」

LABEL: 0x1D22
STRING: Yukari slowly took Hiragino's hand and pulled him with her out into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x1DD4
STRING: 「Hurry up, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x1E05
STRING: 「Momoi, there's no point in being in such a hurry.」

LABEL: 0x1E3B
STRING: 「And Katagiri-kun, you don't have to――」

LABEL: 0x1EDB
STRING: 「I don't understand how you can be so calm.」

LABEL: 0x1F7C
STRING: 「If now isn't the time to hurry, then when will it be?!」

LABEL: 0x1FB4
STRING: 「You do realize that your life is at stake here?」

LABEL: 0x2011
STRING: 「...I understand that very well.」

LABEL: 0x2062
STRING: Hiragino patted Yukari on the head.

LABEL: 0x209C
STRING: She raised her voice in protest.

LABEL: 0x218B
STRING: 「...What's with you?」

LABEL: 0x21BE
STRING: 「Let's take our time. I'm feeling a little tired.」

LABEL: 0x221A
STRING: Her footsteps slowly stopped,

LABEL: 0x2262
STRING: either because Hiragino's calm demeanor threw her off, or because she had calmed down herself.

LABEL: 0x22C6
STRING: I lay Touri down on the bed carefully so she wouldn't wake up.

LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: Now that <COOS> was gone, it wouldn't be a problem to let her sleep here alone.

LABEL: 0x2364
STRING: She looked defenseless, sleeping there with her mouth slightly open.

LABEL: 0x2394
STRING: Even though Hikari, who had called this girl her sister, was now dead.

LABEL: 0x23DE
STRING: ...Even though she died because of me.

LABEL: 0x2416
STRING: ――It'd be too selfish of me to forget about that.

LABEL: 0x2469
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x2494
STRING: 「Yeah... I'm coming.」

LABEL: 0x24B4
STRING: I stood up and tried to follow them.

LABEL: 0x2554
STRING: But for some reason, I couldn't walk very well.

LABEL: 0x257C
STRING: It felt like half of my body was still wearing a thick diving suit.

LABEL: 0x25C4
STRING: I managed to keep my balance somehow and forcibly dragged myself to catch up with them.

LABEL: 0x2616
STRING: The emergency room was on the third floor, while the laboratory was on the first...

LABEL: 0x263E
STRING: This was going to be tough.

LABEL: 0x2662
STRING: I no longer hesitated to ask for Hiragino's help.

LABEL: 0x2912
STRING: I reached the first floor while leaning most of my weight against Hiragino's shoulder.

LABEL: 0x29B5
STRING: Suddenly――

LABEL: 0x29CB
STRING: For some reason, my eyes were drawn to the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0x2A09
STRING: To the bridge ahead, and the rear section beyond.

LABEL: 0x2A3F
STRING: Perhaps Reiri, who had disappeared, was...

LABEL: 0x2A7E
STRING: 「Don't even think about going to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x2ABF
STRING: A sharp voice rose up from behind me.

LABEL: 0x2B8E
STRING: I turned around to see Yukari with a stern look on her face.

LABEL: 0x2BCD
STRING: 「You were already caught up in that explosion, and on top of that...」

LABEL: 0x2C07
STRING: 「We need to find the vaccine quickly.」

LABEL: 0x2C4C
STRING: 「Yeah... I know.」

LABEL: 0x2C8A
STRING: I turned on my heel and hurried down the dim hallway.

LABEL: 0x2CBA
STRING: We eventually made our way to the laboratory in the thin darkness.

LABEL: 0x2DC1
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x2DEC
STRING: 「It's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x2E0E
STRING: My eyes surveyed the laboratory unconsciously.

LABEL: 0x2E42
STRING: ...I was looking for Reiri, who I had thought might be here.

LABEL: 0x2E88
STRING: But in the end, she was not.

LABEL: 0x2EC4
STRING: I listened to Yukari's explanation of <Alice>

LABEL: 0x2F00
STRING: while searching for the cure in the midst of all the beakers.

LABEL: 0x2FA0
STRING: 「<Alice> is a highly lethal virus.」

LABEL: 0x2FDB
STRING: Her voice sounded loathing.

LABEL: 0x2FFD
STRING: I sensed a personal hatred in her tone.

LABEL: 0x303F
STRING: It was so strong that I couldn't help but think if <Alice> had killed her parents or something――

LABEL: 0x3101
STRING: 「By the way, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x3121
STRING: 「You know the difference between viruses and bacteria, right?」

LABEL: 0x3162
STRING: She fired a question at me.

LABEL: 0x317E
STRING: My hands stopped for a moment as her words somehow reminded me of the conversation I'd had with Reiri.

LABEL: 0x31CC
STRING: Even though I had a scientific background, I specialized in information science.

LABEL: 0x31FE
STRING: My knowledge of some subjects was not even on the level of a first-year undergraduate unless I had a personal interest in it.

LABEL: 0x3252
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x326C
STRING: 「Bacteria are living beings, right?」

LABEL: 0x3292
STRING: 「They have their own cells, steal nutrients from infected creatures, and multiply themselves.」

LABEL: 0x32DC
STRING: 「Viruses, on the other hand... I don't really know if it's correct to call them living things.」

LABEL: 0x332C
STRING: 「They have no cells of their own but thrive by tricking their host's cells into multiplying themselves.」

LABEL: 0x3391
STRING: 「That's correct.」

LABEL: 0x33B4
STRING: Yukari didn't seem surprised when I answered her in textbook fashion.

LABEL: 0x33F4
STRING: This much was within her expectations since I was the younger brother of that deep-sea creature maniac, I suppose.

LABEL: 0x345F
STRING: 「As a virus, <Alice> must have a natural host.」

LABEL: 0x3506
STRING: 「It hasn't been discovered as of yet, however.」

LABEL: 0x3566
STRING: 「Not only that, but there have been very few cases of infection.」

LABEL: 0x359A
STRING: 「It's an extremely rare virus that's barely been observed.」

LABEL: 0x35DC
STRING: 「Even if you don't die, you're left with aftereffects, the treatment for which has not yet been established...」

LABEL: 0x3691
STRING: 「Ah, Katagiri-san, could you get that green flask over there for me?」

LABEL: 0x3718
STRING: Yukari's voice brought my thoughts that were stuck on <Alice> back to reality.

LABEL: 0x375E
STRING: I hurriedly looked up at the top of the shelf... Wait, a flask?

LABEL: 0x3794
STRING: There were only petri dishes there.

LABEL: 0x37C0
STRING: Where was this flask she was talking about supposed to be――

LABEL: 0x3874
STRING: 「Oh, come on!」

LABEL: 0x38AE
STRING: Growing impatient, Yukari reached out and grabbed a flask from somewhere.

LABEL: 0x38FC
STRING: She looked at it closely for a second, but quickly put it away.

LABEL: 0x39AC
STRING: 「...This isn't it, either.」

LABEL: 0x39CC
STRING: 「And they dare claim this is all organized...」

LABEL: 0x3A1B
STRING: Yukari mumbled something in blatant dissatisfaction.

LABEL: 0x3A4F
STRING: She was the very picture of a wicked mother-in-law, but she didn't seem to be aware of it herself.

LABEL: 0x3AA9
STRING: 「Hey, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x3AC7
STRING: 「This <Alice>... Just how big of a virus is it?」

LABEL: 0x3B7D
STRING: 「――What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x3BA8
STRING: 「I'm honestly a bit surprised I'm hearing about a deadly virus like that for the first time now.」

LABEL: 0x3BFC
STRING: 「You said it wasn't as top secret as <COOS>, but...」

LABEL: 0x3C49
STRING: 「Oh, that's what you meant.」

LABEL: 0x3C6F
STRING: 「It's probably not nearly as well known as it should be.」

LABEL: 0x3CC4
STRING: Yukari answered evasively while fiddling with another shelf.

LABEL: 0x3CFA
STRING: 「...And it has such a simple name like "Alice"――」

LABEL: 0x3D51
STRING: 「"Alice" is just a common name, of course.」

LABEL: 0x3D9B
STRING: 「Maybe it's more accurate to say that it's a jargon that only we understand...」

LABEL: 0x3DEF
STRING: 「In any case, it's not its official name.」

LABEL: 0x3E2C
STRING: So, <Alice> was just a nickname, I guess.

LABEL: 0x3E66
STRING: But why call it that?

LABEL: 0x3F10
STRING: 「The name <Alice> is derived from its distinctive aftereffect.」

LABEL: 0x3F59
STRING: 「Distinctive aftereffect...?」

LABEL: 0x3F7F
STRING: Yukari had talked about that earlier as well.

LABEL: 0x3FA5
STRING: The aftereffect that no cure had been established for.

LABEL: 0x3FD7
STRING: What was this aftereffect that made <Alice> so vicious, in addition to being lethal...?

LABEL: 0x4047
STRING: I looked back to Hiragino for help.

LABEL: 0x40DD
STRING: 「――It's sleep.」

LABEL: 0x40F9
STRING: 「Sleeping is literally the aftereffect of <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x41C2
STRING: 「If left alone, you'll sleep forever.」

LABEL: 0x41F8
STRING: 「As if you weren't bound by time and had lost your internal clock.」

LABEL: 0x424A
STRING: 「...In fact, the infected person's entire biological clock mechanism is destroyed.」

LABEL: 0x4305
STRING: 「A malfunctioning clock... You get the idea, right?」

LABEL: 0x4342
STRING: I see. So that was why it was called <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x436A
STRING: The cute name the virus had finally made sense to me.

LABEL: 0x43BA
STRING: But, naming a virus after a person...?

LABEL: 0x43F0
STRING: I recalled what Reiri had told me about the difference between a natural and a computer virus.

LABEL: 0x4454
STRING: I didn't know the definition of an organism or what a biological virus actually was,

LABEL: 0x4498
STRING: but computer viruses in the context of information science were my specialty.

LABEL: 0x44DE
STRING: When a computer virus was observed, the first thing that was done was "name erasure."

LABEL: 0x453C
STRING: You should never let the name given by its creator spread.

LABEL: 0x45E6
STRING: Because that was exactly what they wanted.

LABEL: 0x4614
STRING: Allowing a name that contained the creator's claims and intentions to proliferate was unacceptable.

LABEL: 0x4670
STRING: The purpose for which computer viruses were created was, for the most part,

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: a sorry cliche in relation to the means.

LABEL: 0x46F0
STRING: In other words, a desire for self-expression――

LABEL: 0x4775
STRING: 「A way to make the world remember your name.」

LABEL: 0x480A
STRING: 「A way to leave your name behind in the world.」

LABEL: 0x4899
STRING: 「A way to record your name in the world.」

LABEL: 0x48CF
STRING: Countless multiplying programs were being created every day for just that purpose.

LABEL: 0x492B
STRING: And, the hackers who discovered them were desperate to erase those names before they became public.

LABEL: 0x4985
STRING: They purposefully rewrote the names.

LABEL: 0x49AF
STRING: Rewriting the name to be as inorganic as possible, as unassertive as possible, as mundane as possible.

LABEL: 0x4A03
STRING: That act killed computer viruses.

LABEL: 0x4A3F
STRING: And when choosing a new name, a person's name should always be avoided.

LABEL: 0x4ADC
STRING: A striking name such as <Alice> was, therefore, hard for me to accept.

LABEL: 0x4BE0
STRING: 「Even if it's just a nickname, naming a virus after a person...」

LABEL: 0x4C35
STRING: 「There is a reason for that.」

LABEL: 0x4C62
STRING: Yukari responded to me muttering to myself.

LABEL: 0x4D02
STRING: 「The reason a female name was given to this virus――」

LABEL: 0x4D48
STRING: 「It came from the girl who had been infected with it... or so I've been told.」

LABEL: 0x4DAF
STRING: There had been extremely few cases of infection.

LABEL: 0x4DD3
STRING: She must have been the only specimen that ROMLES had.

LABEL: 0x4E11
STRING: I see... There was no better name for the girl with that innocent smile.

LABEL: 0x4E86
STRING: 「I was involved in the research as well, but I never saw the patient.」

LABEL: 0x4EE4
STRING: 「So, that was her...」

LABEL: 0x4F1F
STRING: 「Well, you were only involved for a very limited time, after all.」

LABEL: 0x4F71
STRING: 「In addition, while the virus itself was widely researched within the organization,

LABEL: 0x4FCF
STRING: the personal information of its carrier was kept secret by ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x503E
STRING: A girl whose personal information was held by ROMLES and whose existence was kept secret.

LABEL: 0x507C
STRING: Lumiere=Hikari.

LABEL: 0x509E
STRING: What was going through her head as she introduced herself to me as a poet with a smile on her face...?

LABEL: 0x5177
STRING: 「What's the matter?」

LABEL: 0x51A4
STRING: 「Why is ROMLES researching <Alice> to begin with?」

LABEL: 0x51EF
STRING: 「There are two reasons for that.」

LABEL: 0x521D
STRING: 「The first is because <Alice's> natural host was thought to be in the sea.

LABEL: 0x5269
STRING: 「I've heard that the <Alice>-carrier was discovered on a beach.」

LABEL: 0x52BF
STRING: 「As for the other reason...」

LABEL: 0x52EC
STRING: 「What is it...?」

LABEL: 0x531B
STRING: 「Momoi, take a look at this!」

LABEL: 0x5362
STRING: Hiragino's voice interrupted my attempt to question her.

LABEL: 0x53A2
STRING: He was pointing to a section of a shelf.

LABEL: 0x53CC
STRING: There was something clearly unnatural there.

LABEL: 0x5406
STRING: Among the neatly arranged rows of medicine bottles, one section was completely empty.

LABEL: 0x544E
STRING: It looked like the bottles of medicine that were once there had been taken out.

LABEL: 0x5571
STRING: 「...Hiragino-sensei, what is this...?」

LABEL: 0x55A6
STRING: 「――I'm not sure... No.」

LABEL: 0x55CE
STRING: 「I don't know for sure, but from the looks of it,

LABEL: 0x5602
STRING: it's probably safe to assume that someone stole them.」

LABEL: 0x564D
STRING: Someone――

LABEL: 0x5667
STRING: What had they taken?

LABEL: 0x568B
STRING: Something worth stealing.

LABEL: 0x56B3
STRING: Something useful to entrap us.

LABEL: 0x56E1
STRING: Something we were looking for and needed to exist.

LABEL: 0x57D3
STRING: ――The cure for <Alice> had been stolen...?

LABEL: 0x5823
STRING: ――Nothing was over yet.

LABEL: 0x584F
STRING: That fact was made known to us whether we liked it or not.

LABEL: 0x587B
STRING: If someone really did take the cure, what was their goal?

LABEL: 0x58C5
STRING: My vision warped.

LABEL: 0x58DD
STRING: My perception of reality inverted.

LABEL: 0x58FD
STRING: ――The <SHEEP III> was still seeped in someone's malice.

LABEL: 0x59F7
STRING: 「Why would anyone――」

LABEL: 0x5A37
STRING: There was a sound of something falling with a thud.

LABEL: 0x5A5F
STRING: I turned around to look in its direction and――

LABEL: 0x5AA7
STRING: Yukari was there, collapsed on the floor.

LABEL: 0x5AD9
STRING: What the hell was happening――?

LABEL: 0x5AF5
STRING: Hiragino and I stood there frozen, unable to take a single step.

LABEL: 0x5B54
STRING: 「Yukari!! Yukari――!?」

LABEL: 0x5B7D
STRING: Things were quickly getting out of hand.
